result.trip_overview_narrative: Western Academy of Beijing offers multi-day outdoor expeditions and experiential learning opportunities, including the Duke of Edinburgh International Award Adventurous Journey for high school students, as well as international travel opportunities through the World Scholars Cup competition.

evidence.quote: Multi-day expeditions into the wild over land and water
At the high school level, WABâ€™s Outdoor Education program challenges students to put their skills to the test through the Duke of Edinburgh International Award Adventurous Journey.

programs.program_name: Duke of Edinburgh International Award Adventurous Journey

evidence.quote: Students combine their knowledge of outdoor safety, navigation, hiking, and water-based activities to plan and execute self-sufficient expeditions.
Students will compete locally and, if they score well enough, they are invited to travel abroad in June to compete.

unknowns: Frequency of trips for all programs
